description:
Have you ever struggled to write an ebook?
Do you have a hard time getting started, or finishing?
If you’ve ever had the desire to write an ebook that you can sell, then you’ll want to keep reading:

This course will show you:

  • The real secret to content mapping - Almost everyone gets this wrong!
  • My three step process for creating a plan for your content
  • How to plan out a high quality ebook in less than a day.
  • How to write it in 10 days or less.
  • How to easily create even more content for blogging and article marketing.
  • How to also create mid and high ticket programs
  • Where to find tech tools to get it done easily.
  • Two methods for creating great audio home study courses


Would having your own line of products change your life? What would it be like if you had an entire product funnel that sells higher and higher ticket items?

Maybe you just want to write ebooks. That’s fine. With my system, you can write 3 ebooks in a month. How different will your life be in 3 months? 6?

Look, I tried lots of methods and really struggled for a long time. I made a lot of mistakes and learned valuable lessons. Now I can share the secrets of product creation with you!

What's inside:

I created a video lecture series in which I walk you, step by step, through the process of picking a niche to creating an ebook that you can be proud of. I then go beyond that to show you all the options for creating more products that have even higher perceived value.

I’ll see you on the inside, Richard
title: How To Write A Nonfiction Ebook
